pages.text: Golden Retrievers, as their name suggest, were originally bred to be bird dogs, particularly with water fowl.$(br2)Standing at just under a block tall, these sturdy dogs come in three coats.
These dogs can be most commonly found in swamps and by the water in warm biomes. They can also be found along snowy shores, and rarely in sparse jungles.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Chicken Treat.
